metadata.synopsis: A small one-liner for one of the thugs who captured Volo and prepare to execute him.Can be triggered from stealth or when the execution scene is still on-going. After it is done - the character won't be available for dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the place of the situation at -229; 4; -160 in lower city, in the docks, near the steelwatch foundry.One player character should start the execution scene, another player character can talk to other NPCs.

0.speaker: Rabbelle
0.text: It'll be instant, right? His death? That's how executions go, right? He won't suffer or anything...
0.context: NodeContext: trying to convince themself (not convinced at heart)

1.speaker: Rabbelle
1.text: This isn't what I do on a daily basis. I was just passing by.
1.context: NodeContext: trying to convince themself (not convinced at heart)

2.speaker: Rabbelle
2.text: I mean, you're here too. You understand.
